title: Solicitor General of Grenada
text: The Solicitor-General of Grenada is a law officer of the government for <a href="Grenada">Grenada</a>, subordinate to the <a href="Attorney%20General%20of%20Grenada">Attorney-General of Grenada</a>. The office is one of the members of the government. The Solicitor General could also be a member of the General Assembly.
